name: @vishalgojha/waba-agent
description: CLI + agent toolkit for WhatsApp Business Cloud API automation (India SMB focused).
author: Vishal Gopal Ojha

scripts.build:ts:tmp: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.rmSync('.tmp-ts',{recursive:true,force:true});" && tsc -p tsconfig.tmp.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('.tmp-ts/package.json', JSON.stringify({type:'module'}, null, 2));"
scripts.test:ts:spec: npm run build:ts:tmp && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/tui-view-model.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/replay-guard.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/doctor-policy.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/jaspers-playbook.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/tui-jaspers-command.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/tui-session-actions.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/tui-persist.spec.js && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/tests/tui-orchestrator.spec.js
scripts.doctor:ts:strict: npm run build:ts:tmp && node .tmp-ts/src-ts/index.js doctor --scope-check-mode strict --fail-on-warn --json
scripts.test:start: tsx src/tests/start.test.ts && tsx src/tests/webhook-domain.test.ts && tsx src/tests/jaspers-tool.test.ts && tsx src/tests/demo.test.ts && tsx src/tests/check.test.ts && tsx src/tests/friendly-router.test.ts && tsx src/tests/fix.test.ts && tsx src/tests/panic.test.ts && tsx src/tests/help-me.test.ts && tsx src/tests/whoami.test.ts && tsx src/tests/tour.test.ts && tsx src/tests/storage.test.ts
